commandDescription: Increment the selected version counter by one and adds a commit to  to your repository, it doesnt push the change to the repository, have a step after the package is created to push this commit to the repository
segmentFlagDescription: Select the segment of the version
packageFlagDescription: The name of the package of which the version need to be incremented,If not specified the default package is utilized
projectDirectoryFlagDescription: The directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed
commitChangesFlagDescription: Mark this if you want to commit the sfdx-project json to the repository, Please note this will not push to the repo only commits in the local checked out repo, You would need to have a push to the repo at the end of the packaging task if everything is successfull
refNameFlagDescription: Reference name to be prefixed to output variables
